plot: A day-in-the-life comedy that follows six friends as their lives intersect and their relationships blur to produce love, laughs, lethargy and a loose cannon.
title: Bums
plot_es: A day-in-the-life comedy that follows six friends as their lives intersect and their relationships blur to produce love, laughs, lethargy and a loose cannon.
plot_en: A day-in-the-life comedy that follows six friends as their lives intersect and their relationships blur to produce love, laughs, lethargy and a loose cannon.
